name: mausoleum
description:
explore a strange palace, uncover a mystery, and escape.

this is the second game in my "game a week" experiment. i learned a ton about the tools i used and came up with a decent 3d workflow.

made using godot, qodot, and trenchbroom.

textures and sfx from librequake

sprites from kenney :)

ambient sounds by CO.AG Music, visit their youtube channel
